data.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Spiteclaw's Swarm
data.detailed_description:
Seemingly infinite in number, the devious and malicious ratmen known as skaven blight every corner and crevice in the city of Shadespire. Unlock this warband and play as Spiteclaw’s Swarm in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.

THE WARBAND

  • Five lightning-fast fighters make up the Spiteclaw’s Swarm warband!
  • The skaven inspire when targeted by ploys, both your own and your opponents!
  • Warlord Skritch Spiteclaw has the ability to summon reinforcements when one of their fighters is taken out!

TIPS & TRICKS

  • With high numbers, and lightning-fast mobility, the skaven excel at isolating and swarming enemy fighters. Use sheer numbers and support rolls to take down even the fiercest of foes!
  • A flexible warband, they’re able to build towards sneaky objective snatching or even aggressive combat!
  • Keeping your warband leader Skritch safe is of vital importance! He is able to bring fighters back to the board to overwhelm your opponent, so keep this in mind when you’re engaging in battle!

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 @ 2.80 GHz / AMD FX-4350 @ 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
